titlestmt.titleproper: Episcopal Church Diocese of Pennsylvania conventions 1850
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Episcopal Church Diocese of Pennsylvania conventions

scopecontent.p: Volume is compilation of manuscript materials and printed information pertaining to canons and regulations of the Protestant Episcopal Church in Pennsylvania, c. 1850.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: [Letter, dated 1897, in front of volume indicating volume may have come from Christ Church Rectory, Shrewsbury, New Jersey.
